definition: A composition of visual elements, typically involving the combination of images, sounds, or videos, to create a cohesive and meaningful whole. It is commonly employed in the field of filmmaking and video editing to convey a specific message or evoke certain emotions through the arrangement and juxtaposition of different shots or scenes.

examples.german: Die Montage des Regals dauerte den ganzen Tag.
examples.english: The assembly of the shelf took the whole day.

examples.german: Die Montage der Möbelstücke war sehr einfach.
examples.english: The installation of the furniture pieces was very easy.

examples.german: Die Montage des Autos erfolgt in mehreren Schritten.

examples.english: The installation of the machine requires special tools.
